title: Track fault causing delays on North-South Line

updates.text: [NSL] Train svcs have resumed. Free regular bus & free bridging bus svcs have ceased. We are sorry to affect your early morning commute.
[NSL] Train services are progressively returning to normal. Pls add an additional 10mins travel time from #Newton to #Canberra.
[NSL] Train svcs are progressively returning to normal. Pls factor additional 10mins train travel time from #Newton to #Canberra.
[NSL] Train svcs are progressively returning to normal. Pls factor additional 15mins train travel time from #Newton to #Canberra.
[NSL]: Train svc from #YioChuKang to #Canberra is progressively returning to normal. Free regular bus & free bus bridging svcs are still available btwn #AngMoKio & #Woodlands.
[NSL]: Train svc from #YioChuKang to #Canberra is progressively returning to normal. Free regular bus & free bus bridging svcs still available btwn #AngMoKio & #Woodlands
[NSL]: No train svc from #YioChuKang to #Canberra. Train svc from #JurongEast to #MarinaSouthPier still available. Free regular bus & free bridging bus svcs btwn #AngMoKio and #Woodlands.

[NSL]: No train svc from #YioChuKang to #Canberra. Train svc from #JurongEast to #MarinaSouthPier still available. Free regular bus & free bridging bus svcs btwn #AngMoKio and #Woodlands. Passengers advised to take alternative transport via #CircleLine and #ThomsonEastCoastLine
[NSL]: Passengers be advised to avoid sector between #Woodlands and #AngMoKio. For alternative transport to transit at #CircleLine #Bishan to #Caldecott and to #Thomson-EastCoastLine #Woodlands.
[NSL]: For alternative travel options, please refer to https://t.co/YxfqNjhNa1

[NSL] UPDATE: Due to a track fault, there will be no train svc from #YioChuKang to #Canberra. Train svc from #JurongEast to #MarinaSouthPier still available Free regular bus & free bridging bus svcs btwn  #AngMoKio and #Woodlands.
[NSL] UPDATE:  Due to a track fault, pls add 15mins train travel time btwn #AngMoKio and #Woodlands. Free regular bus & free bridging bus svcs btwn  #AngMoKio and #Woodlands.
[NSL] UPDATE: For alternative travel options, please refer to https://t.co/YxfqNiZDVT
[NSL] UPDATE: : Due to a track fault, pls add 15mins train travel time btwn #AngMoKio and #Woodlands. Free regular bus & free bridging bus svcs btwn  #AngMoKio and #Woodlands.
[NSL]: Due to a track fault, pls add 15mins train travel time btwn #AngMoKio and #Woodlands.: Free regular bus & free bridging bus svcs btwn #AngMoKio and #Woodlands.
